metadata.description: V2TX is the best video to text converter online. Convert videos to text instantly with AI-powered transcription. Free 5‚Äëminute preview, export SRT, TXT, DOCX formats.

why_choose_us.description:
Advanced AI technology meets user-centric design
Experience the difference that sets us apart from other transcription services

features.title: Precision AI Engine
features.subtitle: Industry-leading accuracy
features.description: Built on OpenAI Whisper's latest architecture with custom optimization algorithms that achieve 99.2% accuracy across 50+ languages and dialects

features.title: Lightning Processing Speed
features.subtitle: 10x faster than competitors
features.description: Proprietary pipeline optimization delivers results in 30 seconds for typical videos. Our distributed processing handles peak loads without slowdowns

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.subtitle: Bank-grade data protection
features.description: End-to-end encryption, GDPR compliance, and automatic data deletion after 30 days. Your content never touches third-party storage systems

features.title: Smart Format Intelligence
features.subtitle: Context-aware output
features.description: AI automatically detects content type and optimizes formatting. Meeting transcripts get speaker labels, lectures get structured notes, podcasts get chapter breaks

features.title: Global Content Mastery
features.subtitle: Beyond simple translation
features.description: Advanced multilingual processing handles code-switching, technical terminology, and cultural context. Perfect for international content creators

features.title: Premium Quality Output
features.subtitle: Professional-grade results
features.description: Clean formatting, proper punctuation, and intelligent paragraph breaks. Export to multiple formats including SRT, TXT, VTT, and Markdown with perfect structure

paywall.intelligent_recommendation: Detected: {reasons}. Recommend upgrading to PRO for high-accuracy model (more stable timing, priority processing, long audio support).
